name: Welcome To Hell (itch) (itchforever)
description:
Welcome to Hell!

If you are quick, you can escape to a better place.

Just find the portal!

Made in Gdevelop

I was learning the engine as I made this, so this game is basically a test, some bugs sill remain unaddressed.

Sound effects being used from:

InspectorJ https://freesound.org/s/421852/

Kokopetiyot https://freesound.org/s/218417/
